requirements.summary: Build a responsive multi-page site shell with top navigation and footer, and routes for Home, About, Academics, Admissions, News & Events, Contact.
acceptanceCriteria: Site renders with clear branding for “St Martin School”.
Navigation works on desktop and mobile (hamburger menu on small screens).
Each required page/section is reachable from the main navigation.
Footer includes school name and basic quick links (nav links).

file_operations.description: Create the main app component with client-side routing for Home, About, Academics, Admissions, News & Events, and Contact pages, wrapped in a shared layout that includes the top navigation and footer. Use the core-infrastructure setup already present (React entry point and backend connection conventions). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a shared page layout component that renders the header (top nav), main content container, and footer consistently across all routes. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a responsive top navigation with desktop links and a mobile hamburger menu. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button + Sheet/Drawer-style component if available) to support the hamburger navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Implement a footer showing “St Martin School” and quick links that mirror main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Home page route component and ensure it is reachable from the main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the About page route component and ensure it is reachable from the main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Academics page route component and ensure it is reachable from the main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Admissions page route component and ensure it is reachable from the main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the News & Events page route component and ensure it is reachable from the main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create the Contact page route component and ensure it is reachable from the main navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement the Home page hero, highlights, and a News/Events preview strip that links to the News & Events page.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes a hero with headline and supporting text in English.
Home page includes 3–4 highlight cards/tiles.
Home page includes a small preview area linking to News & Events.

file_operations.description: Add Home page content blocks: hero (headline, short description, primary call-to-action linking to Admissions or Contact), 3–4 highlights (use shadcn-ui Card components if available), and a preview strip showing a few upcoming items linking to News & Events. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add static seed data for sample news posts and events (titles, dates, category, short/long descriptions) used by the Home preview and News & Events listing. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create an About page with labeled placeholder sections for overview, mission/values, leadership/staff, and timeline/milestones.
acceptanceCriteria: About page contains clearly labeled sections for overview, mission/values, leadership/staff, and timeline/milestones.
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Implement clearly labeled About sections with English placeholder copy: School Overview, Mission & Values, Leadership/Staff teaser, and a simple Timeline/Milestones list (static placeholders). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create an Academics page with placeholder sections for grade levels/departments, curriculum, extracurriculars/clubs, and facilities/resources.
acceptanceCriteria: Academics page contains distinct sections for grade levels/departments, curriculum, extracurriculars, and facilities/resources.

file_operations.description: Implement distinct Academics sections with English placeholder content: grade levels/departments, curriculum overview, extracurriculars/clubs, and facilities/resources. Consider using shadcn-ui Card/Separator components if available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Create an Admissions page with apply steps, requirements, optional tuition/fees placeholder, and an FAQ accordion.
acceptanceCriteria: Admissions page includes an ordered “How to apply” step list.
Admissions page includes an FAQ accordion component with at least 4 questions/answers placeholders.

file_operations.description: Add Admissions placeholders: ordered “How to apply” step list, requirements list, tuition/fees placeholder section, and an FAQ accordion with at least 4 Q/A items. Use shadcn-ui Accordion component to implement the FAQ. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Implement a News & Events page with static seed data, All/News/Events filter toggle, and an item detail view via expandable cards.
acceptanceCriteria: News & Events page shows a list of items with dates and categories (News/Event).
User can filter between All/News/Events.
User can open an item to view more details (detail page or expand-in-place).

file_operations.description: Render the seed items list with date and category badges, add a simple filter toggle (All/News/Events) and expandable cards for details. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Tabs/ToggleGroup/Badge/Card/Collapsible if available) to keep styling consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Ensure seed items include fields needed for filtering and expanded details (category, date, excerpt, full content). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build a Contact page with validation and backend submission, including success/error states and contact info placeholders.
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields and email format.
On submit, the form calls a backend method and shows a success message when saved.
On backend failure, an error message is shown and the user can retry.
Contact page displays placeholders for address, phone, email, and office hours.

file_operations.description: Implement the contact form (name, email, subject, message) with client-side validation (required fields + email format), call the backend method submitContactForm, and display success/error states with retry. Also render contact info placeholders (address, phone, email, office hours). Use shadcn-ui Form/Input/Textarea/Button/Alert components if available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a small frontend service wrapper that calls the backend interface method submitContactForm and returns a typed result used by ContactPage. Keep implementation aligned with the project's core-infrastructure backend connection patterns. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply a consistent warm-neutral + deep-green academic visual theme across the site (no blue/purple primary palette).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across all pages (same heading styles, button styles, card styles).
Primary palette is not blue/purple.
UI looks polished on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Add global styles and theme tokens (via CSS variables used by Tailwind/shadcn-ui) to establish a warm neutral background and deep green primary/accent, plus consistent typography and spacing defaults. Ensure all user-facing text remains English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust/extend Tailwind theme (as needed) to support the classic academic look (e.g., container sizing, font family additions, and ensuring primary/secondary map to the deep-green and warm-neutral CSS variables). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent layout spacing and shared section styling (page headings, section spacing, max widths) so all pages look cohesive on mobile and desktop. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add generated crest/logo and hero illustration (and subtle pattern) as static assets and use them in header branding and the Home hero.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist in frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
Header displays the school logo/crest image.
Home hero section uses the hero illustration image responsively (no layout shift, appropriate object-fit).

file_operations.description: Add the generated St Martin School crest/logo image as a static asset at this exact path/filename so it can be used by the header branding.
Add the generated homepage hero illustration as a static asset at this exact path/filename for responsive use in the Home hero.
Add the generated subtle background pattern as a static asset at this exact path/filename for optional use in page backgrounds/sections.

Wire in the crest image from frontend/public/assets/generated/st-martin-crest.dim_512x512.png as the header brand mark alongside “St Martin School”. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Use the hero illustration from frontend/public/assets/generated/st-martin-hero.dim_1600x900.png in the hero section with responsive sizing and appropriate object-fit to avoid layout shift. Optionally incorporate frontend/public/assets/generated/st-martin-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png as a subtle background treatment while maintaining readability. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
